description: Episode number 4 of Series "Understanding maternal grief". Why? Why did this happen to me? This video looks at the grief reaction women following the birth of a disabled baby. Effects of long term stress and the impact of unresolved grief are illustrated through an interview with the mother of a teenage child born with severe disabilities.
related_objects: Series; S01169; Understanding maternal grief; Active; 1992
